Perils_Covered: Flood, Earthquake, Machinery Breakdown, Fire & Allied Perils, Business Interruption
Main_Activities: Modification of Diversion Tunnel into Tunnel Spillway Arrangement - Civil & HM Works (Tunnel Spillway, Adit to GOC, GOC Gate Shaft, Inlet Bellmouth, Outlet Concrete Dyke and Energy Dissipation Arrangement) for Teesta-V Power Station
Proposed_Terms_Conditions: Letter of Acceptance issued in duplicate, requiring a signed and stamped duplicate copy as proof of acknowledgement and confirmation. The Insured is directed to contact Head of Project, Teesta-V Power Station, NHPC Limited for taking over the work site and to commence the Works immediately. The project scope includes Civil Works, Hydro Mechanical Works (Plant, Equipment, Mandatory Spare Parts, Local Transportation, Installation, Testing, and Commissioning) as detailed across Schedules 1-5. Specific item numbers are listed for Abnormally High Quoted Items (AHR) and Mandatory Spare Parts.
